pages.text: The True Sun Talisman grants 5% increased damage while it's a sunny day and the sky is visible directly above.  The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_epic)Epic Talisman Base$(/l).  The talisman is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:force_of_environment)Force of Environment$(/l).
